head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GOLDSTEIN, DOROTHY K.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GOLDSTEIN, DOROTHY K.

block.p: GOLDSTEIN-Dorothy K. 99 years old died On June 9, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Samuel. Devoted mother of M. Robert and Susan Goldstein, Arthur D. and Muriel Goldstein and Michael J. and Roberta Goldstein. Cherished grandmother and great-grandmother. Graveside Services, Sunday 11:30 AM, at Knollwood Park Cemetery, Brooklyn, NY.
